title: Arm & Hammer Forever Fresh Clumping Cat Litter Lavender, MultiCat 18lb With 20% More Lavender Freshness, Pet Friendly With Essential Oils
description: ARM & HAMMER ™ FOREVER FRESH Clumping Litter provides long-lasting odor control and lasting freshness. This odor-controlling cat litter is only available online—ready to be shipped directly to you. It's convenient, new 18lb. size also delivers 20% more lavender freshness than our 20lb. size
